directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and cook garlic until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add asparagus and stir-fry until tender but still firm to the bite, 5 to 7 minutes. Season with salt and drizzle with lemon juice. Place in a bowl and add cherry tomatoes.
Stir vinegar, mustard, sugar, and salt together in a small bowl. Pour in olive oil and mix well. Drizzle dressing over asparagus and tomatoes and mix well. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed
1 pound asparagus spears, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces
1 squeeze lemon juice, or to taste
title: Warm Asparagus Salad with Tomatoes
